introduction: A biographical documentary about the incredible life and career of one of the most charismatic personalities in film, theatre and music: Liza Minnelli. Featuring interviews with award-winning broadcaster and journalist Afua Hagan, and cultural historian and author Jen Otter-Bickerdike. Includes some of Liza's best songs and albums and clips of the Diva herself.一部传记纪录片，讲述了电影、戏剧和音乐界最具魅力的人物之一 Liza Minnelli 令人难以置信的生活和职业生涯。包括对屡获殊荣的广播员兼记者 Afua Hagan 和文化历史学家兼作家 Jen Otter-Bickerdike 的采访。包括 Liza 的一些最佳歌曲和专辑以及 Diva 本人的剪辑。
